Name: Slack - Send Notification using Block Kit
Description: Send a message notification to Slack using the Block Kit formatting. These messages will be limited to more basic formats (e.g., using functions and inputs probably won't work), but you still will be able to make much nicer looking messages this way with the ability to preview them using the [Block Kit Builder](https://app.slack.com/block-kit-builder).

Parameters.Name: ssn_HookUrl
Parameters.Label: Hook URL
Parameters.HelpText: The Webhook URL provided by Slack In the Incoming Webhook settings. This will provide the channel, Icon, and Username for the message by default.

Parameters.Name: ssn_Channel
Parameters.Label: Slack Channel
Parameters.HelpText: Which Slack channel to post notification to. *This will be ignored if using a webhook from an app.*

Parameters.Name: ssn_Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username shown in Slack against the notification. *This will be ignored if using a webhook from an app.*

Parameters.Name: ssn_IconUrl
Parameters.Label: Icon URL
Parameters.HelpText: The icon shown in Slack against the notification. *This will be ignored if using a webhook from an app.*

Parameters.Name: ssn_BlockObj
Parameters.Label: Block Object
Parameters.HelpText: Paste the entire JSON object from the [Block Kit Builder](https://app.slack.com/block-kit-builder) here.
